We overcame this ordeal as well. Get well soon,
my daughter. Thank you,

To everyone who lives in the shadow of our frontier principality.

..."Don't lean on a tree, it will rot...

you invent the Keykavus lie. Do

n't this the ring you gave him when you made him sultan with Rukneddin Kilij Arslan?
